title: Hyundai Severs Ties With Alabama Factories for Child Labor #Shorts

media:group.media:title: Hyundai Severs Ties With Alabama Factories for Child Labor #Shorts
media:group.media:description:
Watch The Full Philip DeFranco Show: https://www.youtube.com/defranco?sub_confirmation=1
Subscribe for more Quickie News: https://www.youtube.com/defranco?sub_confirmation=1

There’s just too much child labor in the U.S. for Hyundai. The Korean automaker is severing ties with its American subsidiaries. Because children as young as 12 were found working at two Alabama plants. Now it’s investigating dozens of other locations in its U.S. supply chain for similar practices
